name: Purdle
description:
A highly competitive 1V1 Wordle-like made in just over 24 hours!

And you don't have to wait till tomorrow to play more than once...

Purdle, pixel Wordle but multiplayer this time!

Controls: [ Keyboard keys ]

After each guess, the colour of the tiles will change to show how close your guess was to the word.

Green: In the word in and the right spot

Yellow: In the word but not the right spot

Grey: Not in the word
